mapper.select: SELECT RB.REBO_NO,RB.GOBO_NO,RB.REBO_CONTENT,RB.REBO_WRITER, RB.REBO_WRITER_ID,RB.REBO_REGDATE,RB.REBO_MODIFY_DATE,RB.REBO_STEP, RB.REBO_DEPTH,GB.GOBO_NO FROM ADMIN.REPLY_BOARD RB INNER JOIN ADMIN.GONGJI_BOARD GB ON GB.GOBO_NO = RB.GOBO_NO WHERE RB.GOBO_NO = #{gobo_no} AND REBO_DEPTH = '0' ORDER BY REBO_REGDATE ASC
SELECT REBO_NO FROM ADMIN.REPLY_BOARD WHERE REBO_NO = (SELECT MAX(REBO_NO)FROM REPLY_BOARD rb)

SELECT RB.REBO_NO,RB.GOBO_NO,RB.REBO_CONTENT,RB.REBO_WRITER, RB.REBO_WRITER_ID,RB.REBO_REGDATE,RB.REBO_MODIFY_DATE,RB.REBO_STEP, RB.REBO_DEPTH,GB.GOBO_NO FROM ADMIN.REPLY_BOARD RB INNER JOIN ADMIN.GONGJI_BOARD GB ON GB.GOBO_NO = RB.GOBO_NO WHERE RB.GOBO_NO = #{gobo_no} AND REBO_DEPTH = '1' ORDER BY REBO_REGDATE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMIN.REPLY_BOARD (REBO_NO, GOBO_NO, REBO_CONTENT, REBO_WRITER, REBO_WRITER_ID, REBO_REGDATE, REBO_MODIFY_ID, REBO_MODIFY_DATE, REBO_STEP, REBO_DEPTH, REBO_DELFLAG) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(REBO_NO)+1,0) FROM REPLY_BOARD), #{gobo_no}, #{rebo_content}, #{rebo_writer}, #{rebo_writer_id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , #{rebo_writer_id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REBO_STEP)+1,0) FROM REPLY_BOARD), 0, 'N' )

INSERT INTO ADMIN.REPLY_BOARD (REBO_NO, GOBO_NO, REBO_CONTENT, REBO_WRITER, REBO_WRITER_ID, REBO_REGDATE, REBO_MODIFY_ID, REBO_MODIFY_DATE, REBO_STEP, REBO_DEPTH, REBO_DELFLAG) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(REBO_NO)+1,0) FROM REPLY_BOARD), #{gobo_no}, #{rebo_content}, #{rebo_writer}, #{rebo_writer_id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , #{rebo_writer_id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{rebo_step}, 1, 'N' )
